# Cr Change Model Selection

$$
\begin{align}
\log(\text{Odds}(\text{AKI}=1)) &= \beta_0 + \beta_1\cdot\text{Age} + \beta_2\cdot\text{APACHE}_\text{II} + \beta_3\cdot\text{PCs_Cardio} \\
  &\qquad + \beta_4\cdot\text{Vasopressor} + \beta_5\cdot\text{Diabetes} + \beta_6\cdot\text{AF} + \beta7\cdot\text{IHD} \\
  &\qquad + \beta_8\cdot\text{HF} + \beta_9\cdot\text{HT} + \beta_{10}\cdot\text{PVD} + \beta_{11}\cdot\text{ChronicLiverDisease} \\
  &\qquad + \boxed{\beta_{12}\cdot\Delta\text{cr}} + \boxed{\beta_{13}\cdot\text{cr}}
\end{align}
$$
